{{book |title=Lembas Extra 2022
Númenor | image = Lembas Extra 2022.jpg |editor=Jan van Breda and [[Renée Vink]] |illustrator=Lúthien Dulk (cover art) |publisher=[[Unquendor]] |date=[[2022]] |format= |pages=288 |isbn=978-9492469342 }} '''''Lembas Extra 2022: Númenor''''' is an issue of the journal ''[[Lembas (journal)|Lembas Extra]]''. The issue contains thirdteen essays on the matter of [[Númenor]]. ==Contents== *Introduction by Jan van Breda *[[David Bratman]]: "C.S. Lewis, Númenórean" *[[User:LorenzoCB|Lorenzo Carrera Bloise]]: "The Composition of ''The Downfall of Númenor''" *[[Nils Ivar Agøy]]: "The Stopgap Second Age" *Hamish Williams: "The Five Ages of Tolkien's Greek Thalassocracy: A comparative study of Númenórean narrative history" *[[Renée Vink]]: "Lords of the West: Imperialism and Colonialism in Second Age Middle-earth" *José Boto: "Law in Númenor" *David Dodds: "Faithful cultus in Númenor and Númenórean Middle-earth" *[[Kristine Larsen]]: "Tar-Meneldur and the Royal Sorontil Observatory" *[[Łukasz Neubauer]]: "The Eagles hovering above the people: A Biblical gloss to the witnesses of Manwë in 'A Description of Númenor'" *Renée Vink: "The Caldera and the Cauldron: Númenor's volcanic outburst and The Great Wave" *Henk Looijestein: "Ar-Zimraphel, the shadow queen: A reappraisal of the last queen of Númenor" *Pamina Camacho: "Tolkien, Plato, and the Trap of realism: With an Appendix on Fanfiction" *[[Paul Corfield Godfrey]]: "The Second Age: A beginning and an end" *Abbreviations *Biographies ==External links== *[https://www.unquendor.nl/?p=2397 Official page] *[https://www.tolkienshop.com/contents/en-uk/p10807_Lembas-extra-2022_-Numenor.html Purchase page] {{title|journal}} [[Category:Lembas Extra]]
